thread.title: News24.com | Stellenbosch to face Parliament committee on transformation policy
thread.title_full: News24.com | Stellenbosch to face Parliament committee on transformation policy

title: News24.com | Stellenbosch to face Parliament committee on transformation policy
text: News24.com | Stellenbosch to face Parliament committee on transformation policy Tuesday, 1 September 2015 (23 minutes ago) Stellenbosch University is expected to brief Parliament 's Higher Education and Training portfolio committee on progress in implementing its transformation plan and language policy.
